example.text: Cytokines altered the expression and activity of the multidrug resistance transporters in human hepatoma cell lines; analysis using RT-PCR and cDNA microarrays.
example.arg: the expression and activity of the multidrug resistance transporters

example.text: In protein-coding transcripts, 79% of splice variations could alter the protein product. Whole-transcriptome analyses resulted in the identification of 2,431 sense-antisense pairs.
